Basics.abstract: During my internship, I stumbled upon a Taxidermy shop that caught my eye with its collection of Menelaus Blue Morpho butterflies. I was immediately struck by the mesmerising beauty of these creatures. Each Menelaus Blue Morpho displayed its own distinct patterns and hues, making it truly unique. Inspired by their enchanting appearance, I envisioned incorporating the Menelaus Blue Morpho into my artistic logo, captivated by the idea of symbolising individuality and beauty.

chords.name: C major
chords.description: The sun rises over a tranquil meadow, casting golden rays of joy and warmth. A sense of contentment fills the air, as birds sing melodies of pure bliss.

chords.name: D minor
chords.description: Drops of rain fall gently on a solitary window pane, tracing melancholy paths as they merge into a river of tears. A longing for solace whispers through the mist.

chords.name: E minor
chords.description: A lone traveler walks through a misty forest, where shadows dance among ancient trees. Echoes of forgotten dreams linger in the air, mingling with the scent of damp earth.

chords.name: F major
chords.description: Fields of wildflowers sway in the breeze, painting the landscape with vibrant hues of happiness and hope. The air is filled with the sweet scent of possibility.

chords.name: G major
chords.description: The ocean stretches out to the horizon, its waves crashing against rugged cliffs with boundless energy and determination. A sense of adventure fills the salty air.

chords.name: A minor
chords.description: A solitary figure stands atop a windswept hill, gazing out at the expanse of the universe. Thoughts drift like wisps of clouds, reflecting on the journey of the soul.

chords.name: B diminished
chords.description: Shadows twist and turn in a labyrinth of uncertainty, casting doubt upon the path ahead. Tension hangs in the air like a heavy cloak, suffocating hope with each breath.
